title: The Electric Dragon SFX Pack
description: The Electric Dragon pack is an audio pack you can use to create the sounds of a big electricity spewing dragon
longDescription:
This is a construction pack that includes numerous audio files for creating the sounds of an Electric Dragon


Demo Link

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Fight Sounds
  • Electric Sounds (From Arcs, to Static)
  • Steps Sound on different surfaces
  • Vocalization Sounds for adding to your project


Number of Audio Waves: 199

Number of Audio Cues: 199

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz 24bit)

Do Sound FX loop: (Some of them do)

Minutes of audio provided: 17:36

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: None
